left_text: Hind femur of male without basal thornlike projection or other modiﬁcation; S8 of male elongate, strongly produced distally, its apex broadening before ending abruptly (South America)
right_text: Hind femur of male with thornlike projection ventrally and, in some species, with other modiﬁcations on ventral surface; S8 of male less elongate, not strongly produced, tapering to apex (North America)
